contact: If you want to get in touch, please email me at farichenswrites@gmail.com, message me on my LinkedIn, or use the contact form below.
heading: Frances Richens
contact_text: If you want to get in touch, please email me at farichenswrites@gmail.com or use the contact form below.
about:
I am a writer and editor, specialising in arts, culture, food, travel and lifestyle content. I have over 10 years of experience in journalism, editing, communications and marketing.

Before going freelance, I held senior writing and editing positions within B2B and consumer publications, as well as nonprofit arts organisations. I have been published in The Guardian, Daily Telegraph, ArtsProfessional, Time Out and Mouth London.

This website showcases a select portfolio of my journalistic and marketing writing. [My CV can be downloaded here.](https://drive.google.com/file/d/1CBEDOmk1hTnBI3heGriHPqBVywNdC1uS/view?usp=sharing)

Iâ€™m a UK national, currently based between Canada and the UK.
